channel.title: Divine Syndicate | QUESTS | Mac | Alot of features | Skilling | Pking | ErasedPk
channel.description:
[size=14pt][i][b]I have made a v2, please check out: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,649266.0.html[/b][/i][/size]
Whatsup MoparScape,
Im releasing my final release i have been working on the base whas ErasedPkz with InsidiaX Combat with some changes. The reason why im giving this away because im done with Java coding and RuneScape sh*t.. I just dont have the time anymore for doing anything on this, i worked on this little project for like 2 months but i work alot and a girlfriend that needs some attention so i didnt really have that much time left for this to make it perfect.
Anyways im proud of myself that i made this because i have learned alot by doing this little project, i wish i had more time so i could learn some more but yeah its life ^^.
To everyone that is about to use/download my version of ErasedPkz i wish u the best of luck and i hope u enjoy it as much i did. *Almost forgot to say that alot of stuff is half way done or not even half, its just because i had to much time or i just could not figure out how to do it because i used as less Tutorials/Snippets because i wanted to learn it myself and just figure out everything myself because that is just the best way to learn it.
For everyone that dont know what ErasedPkz is here is the original link: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/317226-pi-erasedpkz-full-summoning-bob-torva-beast-combat-602-a.html
*Auto-cache downloading. *Alot is Cache packed, except the things i recently added. *Costum loading bar( I just changed the colours of the original one) *Flawless switching(Really flawless not like evvery other people says) *Alot of ErasedPkz memleaks fixed *ALOT of Dupes fixed (ErasedPkz is very old so it had alot) *New Newcommers interface/starters interface (Credits to i forgot but i re-made it a little still not done just need to change the coords of the pics *2 Starters per IP only(Starter interfaces) *Invisible after dieing fixed. *New Barrow armours (Not every but most) *Steadfast, ragefire, glaiven boots etc *Better ::empty command (by me) - http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-PI-Adding-better-empty-command *Costum ::master/::pure command for donators - http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-PI-My-costum-master-pure-for-Donators *Ring of Wealth *Costum Yelling system *Destroy item - http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-PI-Destroy-item-dialogue-at-chosen-items *WORKING FLASKS - I whas working on combining them but had no time. *Alot of updated armours *New Destroy item (created by me) *New Shop interface *New way for the "Bank All" button *Correct interface for Items Kept On Death *New Skilltab (Costum PK Skill idea is from InsidiaX) *3 Quests you can complete. *Loyalty titles (Can obtained by doing ::title (newtitle) ) - Change the command i forgot to change it from owner command to regular command or just make it Donators only. *RFD Minigame re-done *Fightcave (currently 1 wave all the 63 waves can be used check the class) *Some other minigames *PK Armour Degrading *FunPK - Stole the coords from Deathlypvpz v4 *Bosses *Max/Comp cape *NEX Added (Only need the right Animations) *InsidiaX Skilling location + Construction added from InsidiaX *All skills except Summoning works properly *Costum Praying for the God statues/capes *Multiple home's (Change it by talk to Mr. Explorer at starter home ) *All the other homes are not finished, just made the locations add it yourself *InsidiaX their Combat its not great but alot better than the ErasedPkz one *InsidiaX PK Skill is succesfully added *Clipped Ranging/Maging *Clipped Following/Npc following *Enchanted Gem made by myself *All working teletabs made by myself *Use a Magic Potion on a Amulet of Glory to get a Amulet of Glory(4) *Re-done Crafting/Fletching. Idea stole from Battlescape.com *Whip recolouring with Dye + Whip - Made by myself, whas already in v1 *Double XP Ring that disapears after wearing 2hours *Unique starter adventure! *ALOT MORE GO CHECK!
Diffrent login screen(Just photoshopped the original one colours) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5ue8pg.png[/img]
Starters interface (Only 2 per ip) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lcs4e1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dnodv7.png[/img]
Working flasks, they ALL work correctly even the overloads. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/n5riaw.png[/img]
New Shop interface showing [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/deu1rb.png[/img]
Replaced the Go Back button in the Donator tab with Reset stats since Go back is not needed. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/aujwd2.jpg[/img] (To see the donator tab you have to be a Donator, otherwise u wont see the sidebutton at all.)
Items kept on Death interface [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2h5p3wg.png[/img]
Change your own home to your likes (No objects/npcs added yet only bankers & booths.) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jregpe.png[/img]
Destroy item dialogue + Showing my better Crystal Key chest [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ex55cl.png[/img]
Costum praying on god statues, you will only be able get 1 cape and 1 staff. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/sc6jbd.png[/img]
Client with Auto Cache downloading: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/Divine%20Syndicate%20-%20Client%20v1.6.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/Divine%20Syndicate%20-%20Client%20v1.6.zip[/url] Server: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/Divine%20Syndicate%20-%20Server%201.6.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/Divine%20Syndicate%20-%20Server%201.6.zip[/url] Dont wanna Auto-Cache download? Download the cache here: (Fixed) And old barrow armour again [color=#FFD700][/color] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/DivineSyndicate.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/21405738/RSPS/Divine%20Syndicate%20Release/DivineSyndicate.zip[/url][/spoiler]
Support Divine Syndicate to become a loader on RSWebclients: http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-Divine-Syndicate-loader-v2-on-RSWebclients
[b]Credits:[/b] ErasedPkz - The base i used for this. InsidiaX - For the combat, Pk Skill & Some other things. Deathlypvpz - For the FunPK Location and a interface i forgot wich one. Mark - A Friend that helped me out alot and gave me tips and really spend time on me to get me more in the Java world, really appreciated Mark! Rune-Server - For the tuts,snippets but also the great community. Alexander - Good friend and helped me with models and interfaces Myself - Getting everything done

item.title: Divine Syndicate | QUESTS | Mac | Alot of features | Skilling | Pking | ErasedPk
item.dc:creator: @mg300 mg300
item.description:
@mg300 wrote:

SKILLS:

*Firemaking: Using the tinderbox on any log in the inventory will just pick the Logs, no requirments.
Also your character doesnt run away, you can just make a fire at the same fudgeing spot again…

*FireMaking: Get any other base.

*Smithing: The Make 5/10/X buttons do not work.

*Cooking: Just need a better cooking base.

*Summoning: Re-done but its completely fudgeed now. - Better base later.

COMBAT: ( YOU NEED A BETTER COMBAT, THIS IS fudgeED. ERASEDPKZ SUCKS AND INSIDIAX TO )

*Dragon halberd: spec on NPCs makes you crash.

*SPECIAL ATTACKS: THEY ALL SUCK… DDS HITS CONSTANT SHIT…

*Dragon Staff: Or whatever the fudge its called… Special animation is fudgeed LOL.

*Combat: How do i increase the distance of Ranging & Mage???

*Combat seriously sucks… Willing to pay for a PERFECT Combat…

*FunPK: You get EP Drops & Stuff on it, sometimes u even lose everything on death - Easy fix

SHOPS AND STUFF:

*Shopkeeper: If i make him buy and sell items some items will get invisible.
Just keep the shopkeeper like every other Runescape server first.

OTHER SHIT:

NPCS: Changing the respawning time doesnt work… No clue why.

Whats the point of uploading your server while you fucked it up and you want people to pay you so you can fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Divine Syndicate | QUESTS | Mac | Alot of features | Skilling | Pking | ErasedPk
item.dc:creator: @remcowp remcowp
item.description:
@remcowp wrote:

lord0ftacos:

looks nice—anyway i can run this server with java 6 on a mac? my mac is too old to update to the newest OS so I need to run java 6…anyway i can do this on java 6?

Sure, but you need Java JDK otherwise u cannot compile.
You can run the server just change the Run.bat and change it to your java version

Goodluck!

Read full topic
